title: Captain Tsubasa: Kaigai Gekitou-hen - En La Liga
original_name: キャプテン翼 海外激闘編 EN LA LIGA
sinopse: The continuation of Captain Tsubasa after "Oversea Games in Calcio." It keeps focusing on their road to win the Olympic Medal after the 1st Phase. Players from abroad return to join the Japanese "Golden 23" team after their league are over.
